name: Itoshi Kokoro
storyline: Itoshi Kokoro is a tale of a young boy who sets out on an adventure to find the Stones of the Gods. As his quest unfolds he makes new acquaintances and meets perilous enemies. As this simple quest pans out, our hero finds that not only do his actions affect him, but the relationship of mankind with their creators.
summary: Itoshi Kokoro is the second game in a series by Miyuki Taito. The main focus is on young Javoo. As he strives for adventure he finds himself being a part of something much larger than himself.​
